disabled.description: Prevents the item from becoming active when using the “next” and “prev” buttons or the toggle method.
disabled.description_zh: 防止项目在使用“下一个”和“上一个”按钮或切换方法时变为活动状态。

eager.description: Forces the component’s content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.
eager.description_zh: 强制在装入组件时呈现组件的内容。如果您的内容不会在 DOM 中呈现，而您希望为 SEO 进行爬网，这将非常有用。

selected-class.description: Configure the name of the CSS class that will be applied when the selected item is selected.
selected-class.description_zh: 配置被选中项目时应用的 CSS 类名。

transition.description: The transition used when the component progressing through items. Can be one of the built in or custom transition.
transition.description_zh: 组件在项目中前进时使用的过渡。可以是内置过渡或自定义过渡之一。

value.description: The value used when selecting a component in a group. If not provided, a unique ID is used.
value.description_zh: 在组中选择组件时使用的值。如果没有提供，则使用唯一 ID。

events.name: group:selected
events.description: Event that is emitted when an item is selected within a group.
events.description_zh: 在组中选择项目时发出的事件。
